newsitem.title: USA: Hutchinson says operating at break-even.
newsitem.headline: Hutchinson says operating at break-even.

text.p: Hutchinson Technology Inc said Wednesday that because of reduced demand through the first 10 weeks of its 14 week fiscal 1996 fourth quarter, the company is operating at break-even, compared with earnings of $1.55 a share in the year ago quarter.

The company said that quarter-to-date net sales are $65.5 million and the company has shipped on average 10.3 million suspension assemblies per week, compared to the 11 million it had previously planned.
Hutchinson Technology will report results for the fiscal fourth quarter and year end on November 4, the company said.
